concept_data.title: World Scientific and Technical Information System

summary: The "World Scientific and Technical Information System," commonly referred to as "Unisist," is a framework established under the auspices of the United Nations to facilitate the dissemination and accessibility of scientific and technical information globally. In the context of EU legal and regulatory documents, Unisist plays a pivotal role in promoting transparency and collaboration among member states. It serves as a vital resource for policymakers, researchers, and regulatory bodies, enabling them to access critical data and insights necessary for informed decision-making. This system underscores the EU's commitment to fostering innovation and knowledge-sharing within the international community.
